title: Wanted:  T206 Abbaticchio - Blue Sleeves - Graded PSA 5 or higher

posts.post_title: Wanted:  T206 Abbaticchio - Blue Sleeves - Graded PSA 5 or higher
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marty
I'm looking for a T206 Ed Abbaticchio with blue sleeves, graded PSA 5 or higher.  Can pay cash or trade for other T206 cards.  Let me know if you have one you'd like to get rid of!
